text: Marcel Van Langenhove (born 16 April 1944) is a Belgian politician and a former football referee. He refereed one game at the 1990 FIFA World Cup, between Ireland and Egypt. He was the mayor of his native city of Wemmel from 2001 until 2010. ==External links== * Profile at worldreferee.com Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian politicians Category:Belgian football referees Category:1990 FIFA World Cup referees Category:Mayors of places in Belgium Category:People from Flemish Brabant
title: Marcel Van Langenhove (referee)
